userStories.title: Update Edit Ticket Modal

userStories.title: Update New Ticket Modal Description Field
userStories.description:
The "New Ticket" modal description field is currently too small and non-resizable (rows=3, resize-none). 

Expected behavior:
- Increase default height (e.g., rows=6 or 8)
- Allow vertical resizing (change `resize-none` to `resize-y`)
- Ensure consistent styling with the Edit Ticket modal.
